title: John Dory with courgette shoestring fries
description: Orange, herbs and pink peppercorns add zing to simply fried John Dory fillets.  Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a mandoline.
ingredients: 1 litre/1¾ pint vegetable oil, for deep-frying
500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, seasoned with salt and pepper
extra virgin olive oil, for frying
1 large handful of mixed herbs (mint, dill, basil and sage), finely chopped
1 small handful of pink and green peppercorns
flaky sea salt and ground black pepper
